de-DE.goodbye_response: Auf Wiedersehen von Air Traffic Control!
de-DE.hello_response: Ait Traffic Control. Du kannst mich fragen, was über einen Ort fliegt.
de-DE.radar_response: Du kannst eine Anfrage stellen, oder sag "Stop" oder "Ende" zu beenden.
de-DE.radar_reprompt_1: Du hast keineen gültigen Ort eingegeben. Bitte versuch nochmal.
de-DE.radar_reprompt_2: Ich habe den Ort nicht erkannt. Versuch nochmal. Zum Beispiel: Was fliegt über Berlin?
de-DE.craft_type_error: Ich haben den Flugzeugtyp nicht erkannt. Versuch nochmal.

en-UK.goodbye_response: Happy travels from Air Traffic Control!
en-UK.hello_response: Air Traffic Control. You can ask me what is flying over any location.
en-UK.radar_response: You can make a request, or say "Quit" or "Cancel" to exit.
en-UK.radar_reprompt_1: You did not give a valid location. Please try again.
en-UK.radar_reprompt_2: I did not recognize a location. Try something like: What is flying over London.
en-UK.craft_type_error: I did not recognize the type of aircraft you were asking about, please try again.

en-US.goodbye_response: Happy travels from Air Traffic Control!
en-US.hello_response: Air Traffic Control. You can ask me what is flying over any location.
en-US.radar_response: You can make a request, or say "Quit" or "Cancel" to exit.
en-US.radar_reprompt_1: You did not give a valid location. Please try again.
en-US.radar_reprompt_2: I did not recognize a location. Try something like: What is flying over New York.
en-US.craft_type_error: I did not recognize the type of aircraft you were asking about, please try again.
